# VibeTrace — Website Security & SEO Scanner
# https://vibetrace.app

VibeTrace scans websites for security vulnerabilities and SEO issues, then generates plain-English fix prompts that non-technical founders can paste directly into Lovable, Bolt.new, or Cursor.

## What we scan
- DAST (live site): security headers, XSS, SQL injection, CSP, CORS, SSL/TLS
- SAST (code): Semgrep static analysis across 30+ languages
- SEO: title tags, meta descriptions, canonicals, sitemaps, structured data, page speed

## Who we serve
Non-technical founders and indie developers who built their apps using Lovable, Bolt.new, or Cursor and want to know if they're secure before launch.

## Key differentiator
Every finding includes a fix prompt written for Lovable/Cursor. Copy, paste, done.

## Free tier
1 scan free. Pro plan for unlimited scans.

## Key pages
- / — homepage and scan entry point
- /pricing — free and pro plans
- /signup — create account
